content: @Eric Haas @Brett Marquard To comply with US Core, how are you supposed to convey medication administration that happens in a clinical setting (such as chemotherapy infusion)? With MedicationRequest? I find this section to be ambiguous: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/2021Jan/medication-list-guidance.html#pharmacy-fhir-resources
Please test out MedicationAdministration -- we didn't find enough experience in practice to create a standard profile.
